verses.roman:
raghunātha āsi' yabe rāvaṇe mārila
agni-parīkṣā dite yabe sītāre ānila

synonyms: raghunātha—Lord Rāmacandra; āsi'-coming; yabe—when; rāvaṇe—Rāvaṇa; mārila—killed; agni-parīkṣā—test by fire; dite—to give; yabe—when; sītāre—Sītā; ānila—brought.
translation: After Rāvaṇa was killed by Lord Rāmacandra, Sītādevī was brought before the fire and tested.
